abstract: Elizabeth Williamson Editorial Observer submits biggest advantage given to Republican researchers looking for damning evidence against Hillary Rodham Clinton in 2016 campaign season is Clinton herself; holds clear Democratic front-runner with long political history eases task; asserts candidate's efforts to be all things to all people results in inconsistencies that can be exploited by opposition, and says Clinton must stay her true positions, even at late hour.
lead_paragraph: A visit to the Republican National Committee’s opposition research team, who have their eyes on Hillary Rodham Clinton all the time.

headline.main: Inside the Republicans’ Opposition Research Machine
headline.print_headline: Inside the G.O.P. Opposition Research Machine

snippet: A visit to the Republican National Committee’s opposition research team, who have their eyes on Hillary Rodham Clinton all the time.
